Thank GNUs:

Tiberiu - Technoethical
for having done the initial job of porting libre WiFi to Replicant 4.2.

Wolfgang Wiedmeyer
for porting libre WiFi to Replicant 6.0 and for helping with the scripts.

To report on bugs, request features, or any help request, please refer to:
Replicant\'s Forum

Source code is hosted at:
https://git.replicant.us/contrib/Fil/RepWifiApp/
WiFi adapter not found!\nPlease plug in a supported WiFi adapter and retry.
Are you sure you want to delete this network?

Root access is disabled.

Seems like root access is disabled on this device.
RepWifi needs root access in order to work.
Please, enable root access for applications in:
Settings > Developer options > Root access > "Apps only"
When done so, restart RepWifi and grant the permission to use root, if asked.

Root access denied.
Seems like you denied root access to RepWifi.
RepWifi needs root access in order to work.
Please, restart the application, and grant RepWifi the permission to use root, when asked.
RepWifi\'s listener for startup event. Provides auto-start and notification features to RepWifi.
Are you sure you want to reset all settings to default?
Are you sure you want to kill the back-end processes?
Sometimes back-end programs get stuck in inconsistent states.\nClicking this button restores normal behaviour by killing running instances of wpa_supplicant and dhcpcd."
